Title: Shiny Wizard, control for WPF & Silverlight
Description:
Shiny Wizard makes it easier for WPF & Silverlight .NET Developers to create non trivial wizard flows using declarative approach.

Shiny Wizard control is MVVM enabled.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Shiny Wizard makes it easier for WPF & Silverlight .NET Developers to create non trivial wizard flows using declarative approach.

Shiny Wizard control is MVVM enabled.
